amendment.description: Amendment approves an Alaska Native Veterans land allotment application and conveys the land associated with the application.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 113-340 to approve an Alaska Native Veterans land allotment application and convey the land associated with the application.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
